## utils.checkValidProperty() function

Checks whether the property specified is a member of the list of valid properties.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function checkValidProperty(options: {
    property: string;
    allowedProperties: Array<string> | Map<string, unknown> | Set<string>;
}): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | { property: string; allowedProperties: Array&lt;string&gt; \| Map&lt;string, unknown&gt; \| Set&lt;string&gt;; } |  |

**Returns:**

void

void

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->SyntaxError<!-- -->} If the property is not a member of the allowedProperties Array, Map, or Set.
